long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
about
This extension adds a context menu(the right click menu) to search on custom search engines(etc.google).

how to use
1.select a text on a webpage
2.right click on it and select Search
3.select the search engine where you want to search

On clicking the icon,you can access to the option page.
